node.excerpt: Built and designed an e-learning website for youth with disabilities with a Wordpress base…
node.html: Built and designed an e-learning website for youth with disabilities with a Wordpress base including interactive instructional story paths built in Articulate Storyline, interactive flash cards, fillable forms and more.

node.excerpt: Produced and edited short informational and inspirational video on the why and how of…
node.html: Produced and edited short informational and inspirational video on the why and how of teaching self-advocacy to students with disabilities.

node.excerpt: Produced and edited short film featuring the keynote speakers for Transition Tennessee's…
node.html: Produced and edited short film featuring the keynote speakers for Transition Tennessee's Passport to the Future Conference 2020 on how special educators and family members can collaborate

node.excerpt: Built and designed a filterable and searchable database of transition curriculum making it…
node.html: Built and designed a filterable and searchable database of transition curriculum making it easy for teachers to find curriculum to meet their student's particular needs.

node.excerpt: Managed and expanded the Transition Tennessee Learning Management System, growing to over…
node.html: Managed and expanded the Transition Tennessee Learning Management System, growing to over 10,000 users across the country. Produced multiple training courses, suplemental materials and videos and provided end user support.

frontmatter.title: King of Roads Advertising Campaign
frontmatter.alt: The King of Roads responsive website shown on desktop, tablet, and mobile

node.excerpt: Researched and developed ad copy for the award winning King of Roads advertising campaign…
node.html: Researched and developed ad copy for the award winning King of Roads advertising campaign. This included video, web, and print work for both the campaign as well as editing short documentaries to feature in the museum being promoted.
